name: FLAGFIGHTS
description:
*****NOTE*****
THE GAME IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT AND IT DOES NOT REPRESENT THE FINAL VERSION OF THE GAME. THERE IS STILL A LOT TO IMPROVE SO IF YOU WANT THE FULL EXPERIENCE OF THIS GAME PLEASE WAIT FOR THE FINAL VERSION TO RELEASE.

FLAGFIGHTS is an online action shooter in which you can choose where you want to fight and the side to play for. The goal of the game is to capture the flag as long as possible against the other team and at the same time shoot as many opponents as possible. Just select and upgrade your primary and secondary weapon at the start of the game, add grenades, a medicine chest or other ammo to go to the mission. There are other modes on the map, such as Deathmatch and Search & Destroy.
